name: IndianTakeOUT
0:
”Alexa launch Indian takeOUT”
”Tell me about Indian takeout”
”Whats good Indian TakeOUT”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian takeout
des:
A skill for anyone who wants to know about Indian dishes served in most restaurants. Gives you the authentic pronunciation of the dish name followed a short brief. Shows food images on the Echo Show and FireTV.
You can also ask for a particular dish by name. 

To launch the skill say:-
=========================
Alexa launch Indian TakeOUT
Alexa start Indian TakeOUT
Alexa load Indian TakeOUT


Heres what you can ask once the skill is started :-
========================
Whats good Indian takeout ?
Tell me about Indian takeout

What is 'Channa Masala'
Tell me about 'Chicken Tikka Masala'
Is 'Malai Kofta' spicy 
Show me 'Tandoori Chicken'

Here are some dishes you can inquire about :-

Appetizers
============
Shammi Kebab
Boti Kebab
Samosa
idli Sambhar
Khati Roll
Malai Kebab


Main Dishes [Vegetarian]
==========
Palak Paneer
Dal Makhani
Chana Masala
Malai Kofta
Uttapam
Masala Dosa


Main Dishes [Non-Vegetarian]
==========
Tandoori Chicken
Butter Chicken
Biryani
Chicken Tikka Masala
Chicken Dahiwala
Madras Lamb Curry
Kerala Fish Curry
Korma
Chicken Malabari
Kadai Chicken
Kadai Goat
Salmon Tikka
Lamb Chops
Vindaloo
Rogan Gosh


Side Dishes
==========

Naan

Rasam
Raita

Dessert
=======

Jalebi
Rosgulla
Rasmalai
Gulab Jamun
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
